member.name: T:PagedList.Mvc.GoToFormRenderOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring the output of .

member.name: M:PagedList.Mvc.GoToFormRenderOptions.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: The default settings, with configurable querystring key (input field name).

member.name: M:PagedList.Mvc.GoToFormRenderOptions.#ctor
member.summary: The default settings.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.GoToFormRenderOptions.LabelFormat
member.summary: The text to show in the form's input label.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.GoToFormRenderOptions.SubmitButtonFormat
member.summary: The text to show in the form's submit button.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.GoToFormRenderOptions.InputFieldName
member.summary: The querystring key this form should submit the new page number as.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.GoToFormRenderOptions.InputFieldType
member.summary: The HTML input type for this field. Defaults to the HTML5 "number" type, but can be changed to "text" if targetting previous versions of HTML.

member.name: T:PagedList.Mvc.HtmlHelper
member.summary: Extension methods for generating paging controls that can operate on instances of IPagedList.

member.name: M:PagedList.Mvc.HtmlHelper.PagedListPager(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,PagedList.IPagedList,System.Func{System.Int32,System.String})
member.summary: Displays a configurable paging control for instances of PagedList.
member.param: This method is meant to hook off HtmlHelper as an extension method.
The PagedList to use as the data source.
A function that takes the page number of the desired page and returns a URL-string that will load that page.

member.name: M:PagedList.Mvc.HtmlHelper.PagedListPager(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,PagedList.IPagedList,System.Func{System.Int32,System.String},PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions)
member.summary: Displays a configurable paging control for instances of PagedList.
member.param: This method is meant to hook off HtmlHelper as an extension method.
The PagedList to use as the data source.
A function that takes the page number of the desired page and returns a URL-string that will load that page.

member.name: M:PagedList.Mvc.HtmlHelper.PagedListGoToPageForm(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,PagedList.IPagedList,System.String)
member.summary: Displays a configurable "Go To Page:" form for instances of PagedList.
member.param: This method is meant to hook off HtmlHelper as an extension method.
The PagedList to use as the data source.
The URL this form should submit the GET request to.
member.returns: Outputs the "Go To Page:" form HTML.

member.name: M:PagedList.Mvc.HtmlHelper.PagedListGoToPageForm(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,PagedList.IPagedList,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Displays a configurable "Go To Page:" form for instances of PagedList.
member.param: This method is meant to hook off HtmlHelper as an extension method.
The PagedList to use as the data source.
The URL this form should submit the GET request to.
The querystring key this form should submit the new page number as.
member.returns: Outputs the "Go To Page:" form HTML.

member.name: M:PagedList.Mvc.HtmlHelper.PagedListGoToPageForm(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,PagedList.IPagedList,System.String,PagedList.Mvc.GoToFormRenderOptions)
member.summary: Displays a configurable "Go To Page:" form for instances of PagedList.
member.param: This method is meant to hook off HtmlHelper as an extension method.
The PagedList to use as the data source.
The URL this form should submit the GET request to.
member.returns: Outputs the "Go To Page:" form HTML.

member.name: T:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring the output of .

member.name: M:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.#ctor
member.summary: The default settings render all navigation links and no descriptive text.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToFirstPage
member.summary: When true, includes a hyperlink to the first page of the list.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToLastPage
member.summary: When true, includes a hyperlink to the last page of the list.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToPreviousPage
member.summary: When true, includes a hyperlink to the previous page of the list.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToNextPage
member.summary: When true, includes a hyperlink to the next page of the list.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToIndividualPages
member.summary: When true, includes hyperlinks for each page in the list.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayPageCountAndCurrentLocation
member.summary: When true, shows the current page number and the total number of pages in the list.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayItemSliceAndTotal
member.summary: When true, shows the one-based index of the first and last items on the page, and the total number of items in the list.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.MaximumPageNumbersToDisplay
member.summary: The maximum number of page numbers to display. Null displays all page numbers.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayEllipsesWhenNotShowingAllPageNumbers
member.summary: If true, adds an ellipsis where not all page numbers are being displayed.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.EllipsesFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display when not all page numbers are displayed at once.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToFirstPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to the first page. The one-based index of the page (always 1 in this case) is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToPreviousPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to the previous page. The one-based index of the page is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToIndividualPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to each individual page. The one-based index of the page is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToNextPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to the next page. The one-based index of the page is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToLastPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to the last page. The one-based index of the page is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.PageCountAndCurrentLocationFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display when DisplayPageCountAndCurrentLocation is true. Use {0} to reference the current page and {1} to reference the total number of pages.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.ItemSliceAndTotalFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display when DisplayItemSliceAndTotal is true. Use {0} to reference the first item on the page, {1} for the last item on the page, and {2} for the total number of items across all pages.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.FunctionToDisplayEachPageNumber
member.summary: A function that will render each page number when specified (and DisplayLinkToIndividualPages is true). If no function is specified, the LinkToIndividualPageFormat value will be used instead.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.DelimiterBetweenPageNumbers
member.summary: Text that will appear between each page number. If null or whitespace is specified, no delimiter will be shown.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.Minimal
member.summary: Shows only the Previous and Next links.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.MinimalWithPageCountText
member.summary: Shows Previous and Next links along with current page number and page count.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.MinimalWithItemCountText
member.summary: Shows Previous and Next links along with index of first and last items on page and total number of items across all pages.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.PageNumbersOnly
member.summary: Shows only links to each individual page.

member.name: P:PagedList.Mvc.PagedListRenderOptions.OnlyShowFivePagesAtATime
member.summary: Shows Next and Previous while limiting to a max of 5 page numbers at a time.
